description: Texas congresswoman Sheila Jackson Lee, a leading voice for progressive causes in the House, died Friday in Houston.
title: Remembering Rep. Sheila Jackson Lee of Texas

description: NPR's Andrew Limbong speaks with Meredith McCarroll, co-editor of "Appalachian Reckoning: A Region Responds to Hillbilly Elegy," about the resonance and criticism of Sen. J.D. Vance's autobiography.
title: Appalachian writer revisits J.D. Vance's 'Hillbilly Elegy'

description: Former President Donald Trump is doing his first rally since an assassination attempt. President Biden is still off the trail, recovering from COVID.
title: Trump rallies in Michigan as Biden isolates

description: NPR's Andrew Limbong speaks with The Athletic's Chris Vannini about the new video game, College Football '25.
title: Why is there so much hype over the new College Football '25 video game?

description: It's easy to stop noticing what we love about our lives. NPR's Life Kit has tips from cognitive neuroscientist Tali Sharot on how to fall back in love with life's small joys.
title: Life Kit offers tips on appreciating life's small joys

description: NPR's Ari Shapiro talks with Wall Street Journal reporter Louise Radnofsky about the U.S. Center for SafeSport, which opened its doors in 2017 in the wake of the Larry Nassar scandal.
title: Years after the Larry Nassar scandal, are Olympic athletes safe from abuse?

description: In this except from "Space Camp," a special series from NPR science podcast Short Wave, host Regina Barber delves into Pluto's demotion from planet to dwarf planet.
title: Shortwave podcast explores Pluto's planetary demotion

description: Airports, hospitals, and banks said they were recovering after a failed software update delivered by the cybersecurity company CrowdStrike to Microsoft’s Windows systems.
title: Disruptions continue after IT outage affects millions around the globe

description: The U.S. public health agency said it was still investigating information about what specific products have been affected.
title: The CDC issues a warning after at least 2 deaths in a listeria outbreak linked to deli meat

description: NPR's Scott Simon remembers understated comedian and actor Bob Newhart, who died this week at the age of 94.
title: Opinion: Bob Newhart showed us the extraordinary in the ordinary

description: For the last 10 weeks, a battle has raged for a small northeastern Ukrainian border town just five miles from Russia. After delays, Western military aid helped stall Russia's assault.
title: Near Ukraine's front line, a devastated community takes stock after Russian advances

description: The FDA's proposed rule would take a large step in shedding light on the potential harm that formaldehyde can cause to the many Black women who typically use hair straightening products.
title: The FDA misses its deadline again to propose a ban on formaldehyde in hair products

description: Fall in love with your home again with these feng shui-inspired decorating tips from architect Cliff Tan. They focus on creating an environment that feels happy, harmonious and full of good energy.
title: 6 design tricks to transform your home, according to a feng shui expert

description: Every July, campers, counselors and administrators gather on 84 acres of hilly woods in the woods of western New York state that has been home to a Ukrainian summer camp called “Novyi Sokil” since 1950.
title: How Ukrainian scouting culture thrives in the woods of western New York state

description: A day-by-day and hour-by-hour look at the events surrounding the attempted assassination of former President Donald Trump at a campaign rally in Butler, Pa., on July 13.
title: Trump's close call: A detailed time line
